QuestData.Title: In Unending Numbers
QuestData.Description: Between us and the Dragon Soul lies a legion of demons. They will have to be dispatched before we proceed.$b$bIf my timing is correct - and it usually is - a young night elf named Illidan Stormrage should be crossing our path shortly. He will undoubtedly be of some use when it comes to demon hunting.$b$bHelp Illidan disable the demons' portals, then slay their leader, Peroth'arn.
QuestData.LogDescription: Disable the three demon portals, then slay Peroth'arn.
